text: Günter Schröter (May 3, 1927 - February 10, 2016) was a German football player and coach. He appeared in 39 matches for East Germany between 1952 and 1962. He also played for SG Dynamo Dresden from 1950 to 1954 and for SC Dynamo Berlin from 1954 to 1963. He managed Berliner FC Dynamo from 1972 to 1973. He was born in Brandenburg an der Havel, Germany. Schröter died on February 10, 2016 at a hospital in Berlin. It was caused by complications from Parkinson's disease. He was 88 years old.Der Dribbelkönig ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1927 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:East German sportspeople Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Sportspeople from Brandenburg
title: Günter Schröter
